column4: i just installed 9.10 :D -- anyway, flash is not installed, and when i try to install the .deb i get an error: Dependency is not satisfiable: libnspr4-dev -- and i can't apt-get that. What's the proper way to do it?
how? It doesn't seem to be apt-gettalbe
make sure you have the multiverse repository enabled and refresh your repos in synaptic
